passives.name: Magnification
passives.effects: Deal {{pp|0 to 10 for 11|0 to 600|key=%|type=distance to target|formula=1% per 60 units away, up to a maximum of 10%.}} increased {{tip|basic damage}}. The distance is calculated from your {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} current position to the target's position at the time they are damaged.

passives.name: Arcane Aim
passives.effects: Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them grants you {{sti|100 '''bonus''' attack range}} for 6 seconds.
